messages.title: Fairness for Britain - Fairness for Calderdale
messages.content: Freeze Council tax and cutting bureaucracy, saving and protecting services. Local decisions which mean a lower council tax; Plans over the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vince Cable has set out plans which do not require any tax rises for the basic rate, no plans for increasing the 40% rate, and closing down tax loopholes worth £2 billion.

Primary schools will get extra funding to cut class sizes; £2.5 billion for schools can be paid for by ending unfair tax breaks. Labour would abolish the unfair tuition fees; Abolish university tuition fees.
Politics needs fixing after the expenses scandal; Labour and Tories won't act. UK needs proper reform; Elect reform, clean up politics, and give the people the right to sack politicians.

quotes.text: Vince Cable is ready to be PM

images.caption: Vince Cable discussing issues at Todmorden High School

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet shows statistics and figures, i.e., '61% of first-time voters said they would vote Lib Dem after attending Hilary Myers' debate at Todmorden High School.'
